FuncDef:
The ipv6-family mvpn command enables the IPv6 MVPN address family view.
The undo ipv6-family mvpn command disables the IPv6 MVPN address family view and deletes all configurations in the IPv6 MVPN address family view.
By default, the IPv6 address family view of MVPN is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The ipv6-family mvpn command enables the IPv6 mvpn address family.
